long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension that uses OpenAI's GPT model to generate personalized LinkedIn messages for coffee chat requests based on the profile details of the user you are viewing.

Unlike LinkedIn Premium’s InMail, which is generic despite being a paid feature, this tool helps you stand out by referencing specific parts of the recipient’s profile and you can even add your own background info to make the message feel more authentic.
